title: Communities Act (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (COVID-19
text_raw:
1. 
(1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (COVID-19 
Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No. 3) (Temporary Amendment) 
Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall cease to have effect on 30 June 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (covid-19 vaccine export authorisation) (no 3) (temporary amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall cease effect 30 june 2021

title: Communities Act (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (COVID-19 Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (COVID-19 Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No. 
2) Regulations 2021 shall have effect as if the following were substituted for 
Regulation 4(1): 

Where the Minister is satisfied that the requirements of the following will be 
complied with: 

these Regulations, 
the Commission Implementing Regulation, and 

(a) 
(b) 
(c) Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/521 of 24 
March 2021, as amended by Commission Implementing 
Regulation 2021/734 of 5 May 2021. 

he or she may, subject to these Regulations, grant an authorisation to a 
person for the purposes of Article 1 of the Commission Implementing 
Regulation. 

1 OJ L 85, 12.3.2021, p.190 
2 OJ L 104, 25.3.2021, p.52 
3 OJ L 158, 6.5.2021, p.13 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Union (COVID-19 Vaccines Export Authorisation) (No. 

2) (Temporary Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 190 of 2021) are 
revoked. 

[253] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [253]
